description: Execution Ledger (XEL) Specification: Defines the schema required for logging immutable, chronological entries documenting all critical agent actions and state transitions within the GSEP-C pipeline. This log is essential for non-repudiable DSE auditing.

entry_fields.description: Key of artifact (e.g., ASM, TEDS) that was updated/created.
Cryptographic hash of the primary state (e.g., ASM) prior to this action.
Cryptographic hash of the primary state (e.g., ASM) following this action.
